text: Linda Bengtzing (born March 13, 1974 in Gullspang, Sweden) is a singer and television host. She has sung three times in the Swedish Melodifestivalen. == Gallery == File:Linda Bengtzing - Diggilo - Ystad-2021.jpg|Linda Bengtzing in Ystad 28 August 2021.
